original_text: As they were going down to the outskirts of the city, Samuel said to Saul, “Tell the servant to pass on before us, and when he has passed on, stop here yourself for a while, that I may make known to you the word of God.”
korean_text: 성읍 끝에 이르매 사무엘이 사울에게 이르되 사환에게 우리를 앞서게 하라 하니라 사환이 앞서가므로 또 이르되 너는 이제 잠깐 서 있으라 내가 하나님의 말씀을 네게 들려 주리라 하더라

sentences.original_text: As they were going down to the outskirts of the city
Tell the servant to pass on before us
sentences.korean_translation: 종을 우리 앞으로 먼저 가게 하고

sentences.original_text: and when he has passed on
stop here yourself for a while
that I may make known to you the word of God
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신에게 하나님의 말씀을 알게 하려 함이라
